summary: A Vietnamese servant girl, Mui, observes lives within two different Saigon families: the first, a woman textile seller with three boys and a frequently absent husband; the second, a handsome young pianist with his fiancée.
cast: Nu Yên-Khê Tran|Man San Lu|Thi Loc Truong|Anh Hoa Nguyen|Hoa Hoi Vuong|Ngoc Trung Tran|Vantha Talisman|Keo Souvannavong|Van Oanh Nguyen|Gerard Neth|Nhat Do|Thi Hai Vo|Thi Thanh Tra Nguyen|Lam Huy Bui|Xuan Thu Nguyen|Xuan Loi Phan|Xuan Dung Phan|Van Chung Le|Tho Phuong|Long Chau|Thi Van Khanh Truong|Hông Hanh Luguern|Ba Hang Phan
keywords: animal abuse|insect cage|polishing a shoe|sadness|talking in one's sleep
director: Director: Anh Hung Tran (as Tran Anh Hung)
title: El olor de la papaya verde
